data.name: AccountIndexOptionDescription
data.value: The index of the account to create.

data.name: BadSeedPhraseLength
data.value: The seed phrase length must be positive and a multiple of 3.

data.name: BalanceCommandDescription
data.value: Reports on balances for each pool.

data.name: BirthdayHeightOptionDescription
data.value: Forces a particular birthday height to be recorded in the new account. By default this will be the current blockchain length if in online mode.

data.name: InvalidAddress
data.value: Error parsing address: "{address}". {error}

data.name: InvalidSeedPhrase
data.value: Invalid seed phrase.

data.name: LightServerUrlOptionDescription
data.value: The URL to the lightwallet server to query for the block chain length for purposes of printing a birthday height. The default varies by whether generating for mainnet or testnet.

data.name: NewAccountCommandDescription
data.value: Creates a new Zcash account.

data.name: NewAccountWalletPathOptionDescription
data.value: The path to the wallet file to create.

data.name: NoSyncOption
data.value: Do not download the latest blocks in the blockchain first. This will speed up the command but may lead it to fail or report stale data.

data.name: NotAUnifiedAddress
data.value: This is not a unified address.

data.name: OfflineOptionDescription
data.value: Suppresses all network communication. In particular, this will suppress displaying the birthday height for the new account.

data.name: PasswordOptionDescription
data.value: A password in addition to the seed phrase that unlocks the account. While any phrase will do, some wallets only accept one word.

data.name: RequestPaymentAmountOptionDescription
data.value: The amount to request for a particular payment.

data.name: RequestPaymentArgumentCountMismatch
data.value: The {switchName} switch must have the same number of arguments as the number of payees ({expected}) but had {actual}.

data.name: RequestPaymentCommandDescription
data.value: Create a payment request URI and optionally a QR code.

data.name: RequestPaymentLabelOptionDescription
data.value: A human readable label that identifies the receiving address.

data.name: RequestPaymentMemoOptionDescription
data.value: A memo associated with a particular payment.

data.name: RequestPaymentMessageOptionDescription
data.value: A human readable message to associated with a particular payment.

data.name: RequestPaymentPayeeArgumentDescription
data.value: The Zcash address(es) to receive payments.

data.name: RequestPaymentSaveQRCodeOption
data.value: The path to the image to save with the QR code.

data.name: RootCommandDescription
data.value: Performs Zcash operations.

data.name: SeedLengthAndSeedPhraseNotAllowed
data.value: Do not specify both seed phrase and a length for a generated seed phrase.

data.name: SeedPhraseLengthOptionDescription
data.value: The number of words in the generated seed phrase. Must be a multiple of 3.

data.name: SeedPhraseOptionDescription
data.value: Use a particular seed phrase. Specify one as an argument or a prompt will collect it interactively.

data.name: SeedPhrasePrompt
data.value: Enter seed phrase:

data.name: SendAmountArgumentDescription
data.value: The amount to send (in ZEC).

data.name: SendCommandDescription
data.value: Sends Zcash to a given address.

data.name: SendFeeOptionDescription
data.value: Overrides the default fee calculation with a specific value (in ZEC).

data.name: SendMemoOptionDescription
data.value: The memo to include in the transaction.

data.name: SendRecipientArgumentDescription
data.value: The address to receive funds.

data.name: SyncCommandDescription
data.value: Downloads transactions from the blockchain.

data.name: TestNetOptionDescription
data.value: Indicates the account will be used on a testnet instead of mainnet.

data.name: UACommandDescription
data.value: Encodes or decodes UA addresses.

data.name: UAConstructCommandDescription
data.value: Constructs a unified address from a set of receivers.

data.name: UAConstructReceiversArgumentDescription
data.value: Receivers to include in the unified address.

data.name: UAParseArgumentDescription
data.value: The unified address to be decoded.

data.name: UAParseCommandDescription
data.value: Parses a UA into its component receiver addresses.

data.name: WalletPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The path to the wallet file.
